meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>floor</kanji> that makes up the <kanji>step</kanji>s are the <vocabulary>stairs</vocabulary>. Don't get this confused with the similar word 段階, which is the stairs making up the floors to a certain stage.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
